translations: v．重建，重构：重新建立或组织某事物，尤指在破坏或瓦解之后。
· The government reconstructs the damaged buildings after the earthquake.
地震后，政府重建了受损的建筑。

sentences.sentence: The second instruction above reconstructs the remainder.
sentences.translation: 上面的第二条指令就重新产生了余数。

sentences.sentence: You will receive the other Numbers of China Reconstructs in course.
sentences.translation: 你将依次收到《中国建设》的其他各期。

sentences.sentence: If you reconstruct any of the five patterns, you will see that each reconstructs to itself.
sentences.translation: 如果您重构那五个图案中的任意一个，您将发现每个图案会重构到自身。
